post_message: ACLU Legal Director David Cole's closing remarks at Sen. Jeff Sessions’ confirmation hearing for attorney general. "If someone applying to intern for one of your offices had as many questions in his record as Sen. Sessions has: racist comments, unethical conduct, padding of his resume, you would not hire him — absent the most thorough investigation and inquiry, if then. Sen. Sessions is not seeking to be an intern. He’s nominated to be the most powerful law enforcement officer in the nation."
